participant_1.background:
I bake a chocolate cake for my grandson every Saturday and we have strawberries together.
both my moms tell me they love me when i call them.
I would not be able to be a beekeeper if I were blind because I would not be able to see the bees or their hives.
I prefer to read books to get my entertainment, so social media isn't very important to me.
My greatest challenge is to make sure that all of my students succeed.

participant_2.background:
I loved reading books with my parents at the library during summer.
I love Christmas because I get to spend time with my family and eat lots of delicious food.
I'd brag about my famous Harry Potter knowledge to my friends.
i have 5 grandchildren.
Social media is not my thing.

content.text: What is your favorite thing about summer?
I love spending time with my family and eating delicious food.
That sounds nice. What are some of your favorite foods to eat?
I love to make homemade pasta and pizza.
Oh, that sounds delicious. I love homemade pasta.
Me too! I also love to bake cakes and cookies.
I love baking too. I love making chocolate cake.
Chocolate cake is my favorite! I always bake it for my grandchildren.
That is such a sweet thing to do. I bet they love it.
They do! They always ask me to make it for them.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a nice day.
